changelog:
- glitch fix when replying to a far message
- fix avatar clipping for chats with auto-delete icon
- rounder floating toolbar on text selection menu
- padding of grey text in some pages fix
- fix "remove fee" not updating top panel
- fix action buttons in channel profile
- closing pages after login from user info
- support for albums in profile personal channel 
- new music button in profile
- transparent action mode in contacts page when selecting
- darker ripple in settings, trying out without shadows
- rounding in group/channel color page, fixes switching theme inside
- gift fixes
- fix profile name location with music opened from tabs
